Can turn a miss into a hit/Can cast misty step/Can aid pary in combat (+1d10)/+40 HP/+10 WP/Stop aging/Gain a 9th level spell slot (for magic users)/Can reduce damage taken to 0/+1d10 to any roll/Advantage on all saving throws/Gain +20 on one ranged attack/Immune to all diseases and poisons/Gain plane shift/Resistance to nonmagical damage/+30ft walking speed/Can cast a 1st level spell at will/Become invisible in dim or low light/Gain truesight with a 10ft radius/+10 to stealth and invisibilty to magical detection
